title: Meeting - 2025-10-18 15:06
transcript: Good morning. On a rainy evening, Ria found a lost puppy shivering near her gate. She took it home, dried its fur and fed it warm milk. The puppy wagged its tail happily as if thanking her. Day turns into weeks and the two become inseparable. One morning, Ria saw a poster. Someone had lost their puppy. With a heavy heart, she called the number. The owner came overjoyed to see his pet. As he left, Ria felt tears in her eyes but also peace. A week later, he returned holding another tiny puppy for you. He smiled.
summary: Ria found and cared for a lost puppy, bonding deeply before seeing a poster for its owner. With a heavy heart, she returned the pet to its overjoyed owner. A week later, the grateful owner returned to gift Ria with a new puppy.
action_items: Ria takes the lost puppy home
Ria dries the puppy's fur and feeds it warm milk
Ria calls the number on the lost puppy poster
The owner returns with another tiny puppy for Ria
